Articles.Content:
I know this is going to sound stupid, even from me, but the Kerbals driving the vehicles makes no difference right? I let Bob, or was it Bill - the really stupid one, drive my Mun Base into orbit. The rockets starts flipping end over end like a punted football (American kind not the rest of you). I had to disengage MechJeb and manually save them all.

I relaunch and put Jeb in the exact same rocket - Bang! Zoom, right to the Mun!

I know I'm one of the slow or special people around here, but that seems a bit stupid, even for me.
Kerbal stats just affect their expressions currently. Non-cosmetic stats are planned.
Your booster may have experienced a failure that didn't occur on a subsequent launch. It's certainly not out of the question, as I've experienced it a few times on various designs.
I just KNEW Jack would find this one. Yeah, it was probably something silly like a loose screw or something
As my wife would quickly tell you, I'm somewhat of an expert where having a screw loose is concerned!

Kerbal names had no influence into rocket performance, just other name label.

I think that this thread has no need to be continued anymore .
